title: There are a bunch of inaccuracies in this movies
review: There are two plots happening at once and I'm pretty sure the other isn't relevant and the only good part is the voice acting and horrible job at animating the people couldn't get liquid to act like liquid and on the stage performance technology didn't exist or it was physically impossible to do that and the lip sync was horrible.

title: What happened here?
review:
This movie is an unholy amalgamation of different characters from different films/genres compiled into one big mess. It's also a musical? Maybe? I have no earthly idea.
Can anyone, anyone at all, offer a reasonable explanation for why this was made?
